smart_contract:
from pyteal import *


def donation_contract():
    program = And(
        Txn.type_enum() == TxnType.Payment,
        Txn.amount() <= Int(10000000),
        Txn.receiver() == Addr("XEMH3GGFQBEIWES7ZRGPD6DAHSUKUZIC7JXVOFYROTUYH7QZGU2N6AFSFE"),
        Txn.fee() <= Int(1000),
        Txn.close_remainder_to() == Global.zero_address(),
        Txn.rekey_to()== Global.zero_address(),
    )

    return program

if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(compileTeal(donation_contract(), mode=Mode.Signature, version=3))
